languages.text: {n}Друкари издает многообещающий утробный смех.{/n} "Возможно, я мог бы найти занятное применение новой игрушке. Только она не будет интриговать меня так, как ты — а ты знаешь, что я делаю с забавами, которыми не дорожу. Я ломаю их".

traits.locale_text: {n}Друкари издает многообещающий утробный смех.{/n} "Я мог бы добавить еще одну игрушку к своей коллекции. Только она быстро, очень быстро придет в полную негодность".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lets out a portentous throaty laugh.{/n} "Perhaps I could find a use for this new plaything. But it wouldn't intrigue me as much as you do, and you know well what I do to toys that fail to captivate me. I break them."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари издает многообещающий утробный смех.{/n} "Возможно, я мог бы найти занятное применение новой игрушке. Только она не будет интриговать меня так, как ты — а ты знаешь, что я делаю с забавами, которыми не дорожу. Я ломаю их".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a portentous throaty laugh.{/n} "Perhaps I could find a use for this new plaything. But it wouldn't intrigue me as much as you do,.and you know well what I do to toys that fail to catch my eye. I break them."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a portentous throaty laugh.{/n} "Perhaps I could find a use for this new plaything. But it wouldn't intrigue me as much as you do,.and you know well what I do to toys that fail to catch my eye. I break them."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a portentous throaty laugh.{/n} "Perhaps I could find a use for this new plaything. But it wouldn't intrigue me as much as you do, and you know well what I do to toys that fail to captivate me. I break them."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a portentous throaty laugh.{/n} "Perhaps I could find a use for this new plaything. But it wouldn't intrigue me as much as you do, and you know well what I do to toys that fail to captivate me. I break them."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは尊大なしわがれ声で笑った。{/n}「この新しいオモチャ、使えるかもしれねえな。だがお前ほどはそそられねえ。俺を楽しませるのに失敗したオモチャをどうするか知ってるよな。壊すんだよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a portentous throaty laugh.{/n} "Perhaps I could find a use for this new plaything. But it wouldn't intrigue me as much as you do, and you know well what I do to toys that fail to captivate me. I break them."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは尊大なしわがれ声で笑った。{/n}「この新しいオモチャ、使えるかもしれねえな。だがお前ほどはそそられねえ。俺を楽しませるのに失敗したオモチャをどうするか知ってるよな。壊すんだよ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋发出了嘶哑的笑声，充满了不祥的意味。{/n}“或许我可以为这个新的玩物找到用途，但它可不会像你那样，让我这么感兴趣。至于那些我不感兴趣的玩具，你也知道我是怎么对待它们的——我会拆了它们。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a portentous throaty laugh.{/n} "Perhaps I could find a use for this new plaything. But it wouldn't intrigue me as much as you do, and you know well what I do to toys that fail to captivate me. I break them."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋发出了嘶哑的笑声，充满了不祥的意味。{/n}“或许我可以为这个新的玩物找到用途，但它可不会像你那样，让我这么感兴趣。至于那些我不感兴趣的玩具，你也知道我是怎么对待它们的——我会拆了它们。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai laisse échapper un rire rauque empreint de mépris.{/n} « Je pourrais sans doute trouver quelque utilité à ce nouveau jouet, mais il ne m'intriguerait pas autant que vous, et vous savez bien le sort que je réserve à ceux qui peinent à capter mon attention... Je les brise. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a portentous throaty laugh.{/n} "Perhaps I could find a use for this new plaything. But it wouldn't intrigue me as much as you do, and you know well what I do to toys that fail to captivate me. I break them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai laisse échapper un rire rauque empreint de mépris.{/n} « Je pourrais sans doute trouver quelque utilité à ce nouveau jouet, mais il ne m'intriguerait pas autant que vous, et vous savez bien le sort que je réserve à ceux qui peinent à capter mon attention... Je les brise. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai suelta una risotada atronadora.{/n} «A lo mejor podría darle uso a este nuevo juguete, pero no me intrigaría tanto como tú. Y ya sabes lo que hago cuando un juguete deja de interesarme. Lo rompo».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a portentous throaty laugh.{/n} "Perhaps I could find a use for this new plaything. But it wouldn't intrigue me as much as you do, and you know well what I do to toys that fail to captivate me. I break them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai suelta una risotada atronadora.{/n} «A lo mejor podría darle uso a este nuevo juguete, pero no me intrigaría tanto como tú. Y ya sabes lo que hago cuando un juguete deja de interesarme. Lo rompo».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lacht kehlig und bedeutungsschwer.{/n} "Vielleicht könnte ich eine Verwendung für dieses neue Spielzeug finden. Aber es würde mich nicht so sehr faszinieren wie Ihr, und Ihr wisst, was ich mit Spielzeugen mache, die mich nicht begeistern. Ich mache sie kaputt."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a portentous throaty laugh.{/n} "Perhaps I could find a use for this new plaything. But it wouldn't intrigue me as much as you do, and you know well what I do to toys that fail to captivate me. I break them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lacht kehlig und bedeutungsschwer.{/n} "Vielleicht könnte ich eine Verwendung für dieses neue Spielzeug finden. Aber es würde mich nicht so sehr faszinieren wie Ihr, und Ihr wisst, was ich mit Spielzeugen mache, die mich nicht begeistern. Ich mache sie kaputt."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, gırtlaktan gelen uğursuz bir kahkaha koparıyor.{/n} "Belki bu yeni oyuncağımı kullanacak bir yer bulurum. Ancak senin kadar ilgimi çekmesi mümkün değil. Ayrıca beni cezbetmeyi başaramayan oyuncaklara ne yaptığımı çok iyi biliyorsun. Onları kırarım."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a portentous throaty laugh.{/n} "Perhaps I could find a use for this new plaything. But it wouldn't intrigue me as much as you do, and you know well what I do to toys that fail to captivate me. I break them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, gırtlaktan gelen uğursuz bir kahkaha koparıyor.{/n} "Belki bu yeni oyuncağımı kullanacak bir yer bulurum. Ancak senin kadar ilgimi çekmesi mümkün değil. Ayrıca beni cezbetmeyi başaramayan oyuncaklara ne yaptığımı çok iyi biliyorsun. Onları kırarım."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
